{{ ((options, serverSideFiltering) => ( appsmith.store.course ? appsmith.store.types.filter(t => t.name === appsmith.store.course.Type)[0].id : ''))(sel_type.options, sel_type.serverSideFiltering) }}

actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO course (
    name,
    description,
    duration,
    language,
	 	instrcutor,
    thumbnail_url,
    course_type_id,
    course_level_id,
    course_subject_id
) VALUES (
    {{inp_courseTitle.text}},
    {{inp_description.text}},
    {{inp_duration.text}},
    {{inp_language.text}},
	{{inp_instructor.text}},
    {{this.params.thumbnailUrl}},
    {{sel_type.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_levels.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_courseSubject.selectedOptionValue}}
);

INSERT INTO course (
    name,
    description,
    duration,
    language,
	 	instrcutor,
    thumbnail_url,
    course_type_id,
    course_level_id,
    course_subject_id
) VALUES (
    {{inp_courseTitle.text}},
    {{inp_description.text}},
    {{inp_duration.text}},
    {{inp_language.text}},
	{{inp_instructor.text}},
    {{this.params.thumbnailUrl}},
    {{sel_type.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_levels.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_courseSubject.selectedOptionValue}}
);
INSERT INTO public.course_subject (name) VALUES ({{this.params.name}});
INSERT INTO public.course_subject (name) VALUES ({{this.params.name}});
SELECT * FROM course_level;
SELECT * FROM course_level;

SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{lst_subjects.selectedItem.Id}}

SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{lst_subjects.selectedItem.Id}}
SELECT * FROM course_type;
SELECT * FROM course_type;
SELECT * FROM course_subject ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM course_subject ORDER BY id;

UPDATE course
SET
    name = {{inp_courseTitle.text}},
    description = {{inp_description.text}},
    duration = {{inp_duration.text}},
    language = {{inp_language.text}},
    thumbnail_url = {{this.params.thumbnailUrl}},
		instructor={{inp_instructor.text}},
    course_type_id = {{sel_type.selectedOptionValue}},
    course_level_id = {{sel_levels.selectedOptionValue}},
    course_subject_id = {{sel_courseSubject.selectedOptionValue}},
    updated = now()
WHERE
    id = {{tbl_courseSubjects.triggeredRowIndex}};

UPDATE course
SET
    name = {{inp_courseTitle.text}},
    description = {{inp_description.text}},
    duration = {{inp_duration.text}},
    language = {{inp_language.text}},
    thumbnail_url = {{this.params.thumbnailUrl}},
		instructor={{inp_instructor.text}},
    course_type_id = {{sel_type.selectedOptionValue}},
    course_level_id = {{sel_levels.selectedOptionValue}},
    course_subject_id = {{sel_courseSubject.selectedOptionValue}},
    updated = now()
WHERE
    id = {{tbl_courseSubjects.triggeredRowIndex}};

DELETE FROM public."course"
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may delete everything in the table!

DELETE FROM public."course"
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may delete everything in the table!

UPDATE public."course" SET
    "name" = '',
    "description" = '',
    "duration" = '',
    "language" = '',
    "instructor" = '',
    "thumbnail_url" = '',
    "course_type_id" = 1,
    "course_level_id" = 1,
    "course_subject_id" = 1
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!

UPDATE public."course" SET
    "name" = '',
    "description" = '',
    "duration" = '',
    "language" = '',
    "instructor" = '',
    "thumbnail_url" = '',
    "course_type_id" = 1,
    "course_level_id" = 1,
    "course_subject_id" = 1
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!

INSERT INTO course_type (name)
VALUES
    ('Online'),
    ('In-Person'),
    ('Hybrid');

INSERT INTO course_type (name)
VALUES
    ('Online'),
    ('In-Person'),
    ('Hybrid');

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}}

SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}}

SELECT * FROM course_module WHERE course_module.course_subject_id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}} AND (course_module.course_id = COALESCE({{sel_course.selectedOptionValue || undefined}}, course_module.course_id));

SELECT * FROM course_module WHERE course_module.course_subject_id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}} AND (course_module.course_id = COALESCE({{sel_course.selectedOptionValue || undefined}}, course_module.course_id));
SELECT * FROM course_module_content WHERE id = {{this.params.id}};
SELECT * FROM course_module_content WHERE id = {{this.params.id}};
SELECT * FROM quiz_content WHERE course_module_content_id = {{this.params.id}}
SELECT * FROM quiz_content WHERE course_module_content_id = {{this.params.id}}
SELECT * FROM quiz_content_question WHERE quiz_content_id = {{this.params.quizId}}
SELECT * FROM quiz_content_question WHERE quiz_content_id = {{this.params.quizId}}
SELECT * FROM reading_content WHERE course_module_id = {{this.params.id}}
SELECT * FROM reading_content WHERE course_module_id = {{this.params.id}}
SELECT * FROM course_subject;
SELECT * FROM course_subject;
SELECT * FROM video_content WHERE course_module_content_id = {{this.params.id}};
SELECT * FROM video_content WHERE course_module_content_id = {{this.params.id}};

UPDATE course_module
  SET name = {{inp_moduleName.text}},
	description = {{inp_moduleDescription.text}},
	duration = {{inp_moduleDuration.text}},
	course_subject_id = {{sel_newModuleSubject.selectedOptionValue}},
	course_id = {{sel_newModuleCourse.selectedOptionValue}}
  WHERE id = {{ tbl_modules.triggeredRow.Id }};

UPDATE course_module
  SET name = {{inp_moduleName.text}},
	description = {{inp_moduleDescription.text}},
	duration = {{inp_moduleDuration.text}},
	course_subject_id = {{sel_newModuleSubject.selectedOptionValue}},
	course_id = {{sel_newModuleCourse.selectedOptionValue}}
  WHERE id = {{ tbl_modules.triggeredRow.Id }};

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}}

SELECT
    c.name AS course_name,
		C.id as course_id,
    c.description AS course_description,
    c.duration AS course_duration,
    c.language AS course_language,
		C.instructor aS course_instructor,
    c.thumbnail_url AS course_thumbnail_url,
    cs.name AS subject_name,
    ct.name AS type_name,
    cl.name AS level_name
FROM
    public.course AS c
    JOIN public.course_subject AS cs ON c.course_subject_id = cs.id
    JOIN public.course_type AS ct ON c.course_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN public.course_level AS cl ON c.course_level_id = cl.id
		WHERE cs.id = {{sel_subject.selectedOptionValue || 1}}

  (title, mark_complete, content_type, course_subject_id, course_module_id, course_id)
VALUES
  (
    {{ this.params.title }},
    false,
    {{ utils.newQuestionType }},
		{{ sel_newSubject.selectedOptionValue }},
		{{ sel_newModule.selectedOptionValue }},
		{{ sel_newCourse.selectedOptionValue }}
  )
	RETURNING*;
